forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 18C. E winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few clouds. High near 65F. ESE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 52F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 18C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 63F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with increasing winds in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
